meanings.definition: The part of the throat at the back of the mouth.
meanings.sent1: Doctors examine patients' oropharynxes to check for any issues.
meanings.sent2: During a dental check-up, the dentist may look at your oropharynxes.
meanings.sent3: The oropharynxes of a singer are crucial for producing clear notes.
meanings.sent4: In a choir, each voice is like a unique oropharynxes in a harmonious melody.
meanings.sent5: The oropharynxes can be affected by infections, causing discomfort when swallowing.
